chart_description: This chart displays the filtered DRA (Directory Replication Agent) replication properties in properties/s (properties per second). The chart is useful for monitoring the replication performance of Active Directory and identifying any replication issues.

dimension_descriptions.inbound: The 'inbound' dimension represents the number of properties replicated by the DRA from a source domain controller to this domain controller. It can be used to monitor and troubleshoot replication issues related to inbound replication traffic.
